sum get nft balance of the wallet
desc 1 credit per api call  5 credits for each owned nft
get all nfts that a blockchain address holds the nfts are returned grouped by the smart contracts they were minted on
this api is supported for the following blockchains

algorand
bnb smart chain  mainnet only
celo
ethereum
polygon
solana

on solana and algorand if a blockchain address holds fewer than 50 nfts the api also returns each nfts metadata if the metadata is not returned you can obtain it using the api for getting nft metadata
